about.title: About Me
about.text: Books, words and stories were, from a young age, the ways in which I understood myself and the world around me. I have a literature degree, taught English and Spanish Literature for several years and now work as an independent editor and writer.

editing.title: Editing
editing.text: A professional reading of your text is useful to polish it and to explore the possibilities it has. The editing proposals we offer have different scopes and encompass diverse levels depending on your objectives: from the revision of a first draft and advice on the writing process to copy editing in order to reach a high-quality final version. Within this range there are many other alternatives that can be personalized according to your needs. In any case, a critical reading of the text will make it better and will align it to your voice and style.
editing.text2: Tell us what you are looking for in the contact form to see how we can work together.

writing.title: Writing
writing.text: If you have ideas for a text but do not know how to express them or if you do not have time to write. Nothing should prevent you from communicating your ideas and you should not lose the opportunity to put into words what you want to convey. The writing proposals we offer apply to short texts in varied platforms (social networks, websites, magazines, photo albums, among others) and to fiction and nonfiction texts as part of a ghostwriting project. The latter involves face-to-face and/or virtual meetings to collect all the material, a planning stage to define structural and style elements and a writing process that includes partial presentations until we reach the final version of the text.
writing.text2: Tell us what you are looking for in the contact form to see how we can work together.
writing.text3: Texts are delivered in digital format but the proposal can also include the design and printing of the book.
